channel.title: Hecu models
channel.description:
Hey, I've been playing black mesa lately and I've noticed something. All regular hecu marines have the same model, they all wear the gas mask and helmet. I remember there being many different models for the HECU, with night vision goggles, no gas masks etc.
The medics and commanders are fine though. They all look "unique". Thanks for reading
(Sorry if this isnt a bug but something done on purpose by the devs. Feel free to delete this thread if that's the case)

item.title: Hecu models
item.dc:creator: Captain_Mcderp
item.description:
Hey, I’ve been playing black mesa lately and I’ve noticed something. All regular hecu marines have the same model, they all wear the gas mask and helmet. I remember there being many different models for the HECU, with night vision goggles, no gas masks etc.

The medics and commanders are fine though. They all look “unique”.
Thanks for reading

(Sorry if this isnt a bug but something done on purpose by the devs. Feel free to delete this thread if that’s the case)
